data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Junín, Peru.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Junín, Peru

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Junín, Peru to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Junín to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Junín, Peru honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Asheninka, Pajonal people might believe through him.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Junín, Peru.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Junín, Peru the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.section_summary:
the state of Junín, Peru has a population of 1,274,800.

We estimate Junín has 183,659 people who might know Jesus, 1,015,425 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 75,715 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 6 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Junín that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.
